title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added documentation for automating Copilot CLI in GitHub Actions workflows, including authentication and a daily summary example.
Updated changelog and index to include the new Copilot CLI automation guide.
Marked enterprise-defined custom organization roles as generally available (GA) and updated related documentation.
Enabled public documentation for Mapbox Secret Access Token pattern in secret scanning.
summary:

- Updated changelog and index to include the new Copilot CLI automation guide.
- Marked enterprise-defined custom organization roles as generally available (GA) and updated related documentation.
- Enabled public documentation for Mapbox Secret Access Token pattern in secret scanning.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for automating Copilot CLI in GitHub Actions workflows, including authentication and a daily summary example.
- Updated changelog and index to include the new Copilot CLI automation guide.
- Marked enterprise-defined custom organization roles as generally available (GA) and updated related documentation.
- Enabled public documentation for Mapbox Secret Access Token pattern in secret scanning.

### Title
Add Copilot CLI automation guide, GA for enterprise custom roles, and public Mapbox secret pattern
